title: ChilangoHacks - The Ultimate Hackathon in CDMX
description: Join the most exciting hackathon in Mexico City! Collaborate, innovate, and create amazing projects.
hero_subtitle: A 24-hour coding marathon in the heart of Mexico City.
about_description: ChilangoHacks is 36-hour a hackathon where developers, designers, and entrepreneurs come together to build innovative solutions.
about_second_paragraph: At Chilangohacks, we aim to create an inclusive environment where young hackers can grow, network, and collaborate on real-world challenges. Whether you're an aspiring developer, designer, or entrepreneur, this is the perfect place to hone your skills, find your community, and make a difference. We believe that with creativity, determination, and the right tools, anything is possible. Join us as we empower young hackers in Mexico City and beyond to create innovative solutions that shape the future.
sponsors_description: We are proud to be supported by amazing companies that believe in innovation and technology.
what_is_a_hackathon_answer: A hackathon is an event where designers, programmers, engineers, and tech enthusiasts gather to create something within a given time limit.
how_do_i_become_a_sponsor: How do I become a sponsor?
how_do_i_become_a_sponsor_answer: Sponsoring is a great way to grow your business and inspire the youth of the future. If you're interested in sponsoring, email our business email.
who_can_participate_answer: Students of any age from any part of the world are welcome to participate in ChilangoHacks. We are aiming for this to be a hackathon targeted toward high school and university students.
is_chilangohacks_in_person_answer: Yes! ChilangoHacks will be held in person at the H. Congress of the Union in Mexico City.
how_much_does_it_cost: How much does it cost to attend ChilangoHacks?
how_much_does_it_cost_answer: ChilangoHacks is completely free to attend. We will not be charging any fees to attend ChilangoHacks.
how_can_i_find_a_team: How can I find a team for ChilangoHacks?
how_can_i_find_a_team_answer: You will be able to find a team in the ChilangoHacks Discord before the event starts, or choose to work by yourself.
what_if_i_dont_know_how_to_code: What if I don't know how to code?
what_if_i_dont_know_how_to_code_answer: It's okay! Hackathons aren't just about coding. There is also an aspect of business, design, and presentation. You can also attend workshops and listen to guest speakers talk about the world of tech.
can_i_participate_if_im_underage: Can I come if I'm a underage?
can_i_participate_if_im_underage_answer: Yes, but your parents will be required to sign a waiver.
what_project_should_i_make_answer: You can make any type of project you would like! An app, a website, blockchain, hardware, design, or anything that your heart desires.

contact_description: Have questions? Reach out to us at support@chilangohacks.co
team_desc: We are a group of passionate individuals dedicated to making this hackathon a success. Meet the team behind ChilangoHacks.

jafit_role: Ambassador in High School, Inclusion Committee Lead & Finance Executive
ivan_role: Ambassador in Middle School, Spokesperson & Logistics Executive
mariana_role: Co-Founder, Member of the Inclusion Committee & Organizer
how_many_people_can_i_have_in_my_team: How many people can join my team?
how_many_people_can_i_have_in_my_team_an: You can have a maximum of 4 people in your team. You can also work alone if you prefer.
join_team: Do you want to join our team?
